description: This file defines a Modal component in TypeScript with JSX syntax, used for rendering a modal dialog with backdrop, header, footer, and slot content. It exports the component and type definitions relevant to props.

methods.name: Modal
methods.description: Functional component that renders a modal dialog controlled by the 'open' prop, with close handling and optional title.

methods.name: handleBackdropClick$
methods.description: Event handler to detect clicks on backdrop and trigger close action.
